meanings.definition: The quality of being sticky or adhesive.
meanings.sent1: The gumminess of the tape made it hard to remove from the paper.
meanings.sent2: The candy's gumminess made it difficult to open the wrapper.
meanings.sent3: The gumminess of the glue caused a sticky situation in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The gumminess of the situation stuck with him long after the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The gumminess of the honeycomb was a delight to the bear.

meanings.definition: The state of being chewy or elastic.
meanings.sent1: The gumminess of the taffy made it fun to stretch and pull.
meanings.sent2: The gumminess of the bread dough indicated it needed more time to rise.
meanings.sent3: The gumminess of the bubblegum made it a challenge to blow a big bubble.
meanings.sent4: The gumminess of the rubber band reminded him of his childhood toys.
meanings.sent5: The gumminess of the caramel made it a delicious treat to savor.
